details: This course provides an introduction to data science, covering fundamental concepts such as data manipulation, exploratory data analysis, and basic machine learning techniques.

course: Web Development with HTML and CSS
details: Learn web development basics with HTML and CSS. This course covers topics such as creating web pages, styling elements, and building responsive layouts.
Master the fundamentals of Java programming language, including syntax, object-oriented programming principles, and basic algorithms and data structures.
Get started with Python programming from scratch. This course covers basic Python syntax, data types, control structures, and introductory concepts of object-oriented programming.
Learn to build cross-platform mobile applications using the Flutter framework. This course covers UI design, state management, and integrating APIs for both iOS and Android platforms.
Understand the fundamentals of database management systems, including relational database concepts, SQL querying, database design principles, and normalization.
Discover the basics of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, model evaluation techniques, and real-world applications of machine learning.
Learn JavaScript programming for web development. This course covers JavaScript basics, DOM manipulation, event handling, and asynchronous programming with AJAX.
Understand the fundamental principles of cybersecurity, including network security, cryptography, threat analysis, and security best practices for organizations.
